query.name: UnlockEvent
query.sql: SELECT e.*, MD5(e.event_json) as json_md5 FROM events e WHERE e.is_locked = 0 ORDER BY event_id ASC LIMIT 1

query.name: LastLocationForPilot
query.sql: SELECT l.*, DATE_FORMAT(l.location_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as `system_time`, sy.x, sy.y, sy.z, sy.name as system_name, DATE_FORMAT(sh.station_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as `station_time`, st.name as station_name, b.body_name FROM location_history l LEFT JOIN systems sy ON l.system_id = sy.system_id LEFT JOIN station_history sh ON sh.location_id = l.location_id LEFT JOIN stations st ON sh.station_id = st.station_id LEFT JOIN bodies b ON sh.body_id = b.body_id WHERE l.pilot_id = ? ORDER BY l.location_time DESC, sh.station_time LIMIT 1

query.name: MaxMinDateLocationHistoryForPilot
query.sql:
SELECT p.pilot_id, DATE_FORMAT(MAX(DATE(l.location_time)), '%Y-%m-%d') as max_date, DATE_FORMAT(MIN(DATE(l.location_time)), '%Y-%m-%d') as min_date FROM pilots p LEFT JOIN location_history l ON l.pilot_id = p.pilot_id WHERE 1 = 1
GROUP BY p.pilot_id LIMIT 1

query.name: SystemPath
query.sql:
SELECT l.*, sy.name as system_name, sy.x, sy.y, sy.z, DATE_FORMAT(l.location_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as `timestamp`, CONCAT('[', FORMAT(sy.x, 2), ',', FORMAT(sy.y, 2), ',', FORMAT(sy.z, 2), ']') as position, FORMAT(SQRT(sy.x * sy.x + sy.y * sy.y + sy.z * sy.z), 2) as distance FROM location_history l LEFT JOIN systems sy ON l.system_id = sy.system_id WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY l.location_time DESC

query.name: LocationsPathCount
query.sql:
SELECT count(DISTINCT l.location_id) as count FROM location_history l LEFT JOIN station_history sh ON sh.location_id = l.location_id WHERE l.pilot_id = ?
LIMIT 1

query.name: LocationsPath
query.sql:
SELECT l.*, sy.name as system_name, sy.x, sy.y, sy.z, DATE_FORMAT(l.location_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as `timestamp`, CONCAT('[', FORMAT(sy.x, 2), ',', FORMAT(sy.y, 2), ',', FORMAT(sy.z, 2), ']') as position, FORMAT(SQRT(sy.x * sy.x + sy.y * sy.y + sy.z * sy.z), 2) as distance , DATE_FORMAT(sh.station_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as `station_timestamp`, sh.station_id, st.name as station_name, sh.body_id, b.body_name, b.eddb_body_id FROM location_history l LEFT JOIN systems sy ON l.system_id = sy.system_id LEFT JOIN station_history sh ON sh.location_id = l.location_id LEFT JOIN stations st ON sh.station_id = st.station_id LEFT JOIN bodies b ON sh.body_id = b.body_id WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY l.location_time DESC, sh.station_time DESC

query.name: LastEventForUser
query.sql: SELECT h.event_name as `event`, h.event_hash as `hash`, DATE_FORMAT(h.event_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%dT%TZ') as `timestamp`, GROUP_CONCAT(p.pilot_name SEPARATOR '|||||') as `used_names` FROM events_history h LEFT JOIN pilots p ON p.user_id = h.user_id WHERE h.user_id = ? AND h.event_name != 'CompanionApi' GROUP BY h.events_history_id ORDER BY h.event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1

query.name: LastActivityTime
query.sql: SELECT e.event_timestamp, DATE_FORMAT(diffDate, '%Y %m %d') as `event_date`, DATE_FORMAT(diffTime, '%H %i %S') as `event_time` , HOUR(difftime) as hours, MINUTE(difftime) as minutes, SECOND(difftime) as seconds , YEAR(diffDate) as year, MONTH(diffDate) as monthes, DAY(diffDate) as days FROM (SELECT e1.event_timestamp, TIMEDIFF(NOW(), e1.event_timestamp) AS diffTime, DATEDIFF(NOW(), e1.event_timestamp) AS diffDate FROM events_history e1 WHERE e1.pilot_id = ? ORDER BY e1.event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS e LIMIT 1

query.name: HistoryActivity
query.sql:
SELECT DAY(e.event_timestamp) as event_date, COUNT(DISTINCT HOUR(e.event_timestamp)) as times FROM events_history e WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY DAY(e.event_timestamp) ORDER BY event_date ASC

query.name: EventMaxMinDateForPilot
query.sql:
SELECT p.pilot_id, MAX(DATE(e.event_timestamp)) as max_date, MIN(DATE(e.event_timestamp)) as min_date FROM pilots p LEFT JOIN events_history e ON e.pilot_id = p.pilot_id WHERE 1 = 1
GROUP BY p.pilot_id LIMIT 1

query.name: PilotsLastEvents
query.sql: SELECT h.* FROM events_history h WHERE 1=1
